headline: Is VRTX a Portfolio Must Have After Two FDA Nods Ahead of Q4 Earnings?
summary: On Vertex's Q4 earnings call, investors will focus on management's comments about launch preparation for Alyftrek (vanza triple) and Journavx (suzetrigine).

headline: Unlocking Q4 Potential of Vertex (VRTX): Exploring Wall Street Estimates for Key Metrics
